text: Arnica unalaschcensis is an Asian and North American species of arnica in the sunflower family, known as Alaskan arnica.Flora of North America Vol. 21 Page 369 Alaskan arnica, Arnica unalaschcensis (Torrey & A. Gray) Greene It is found on both sides of the Bering Strait, being native to Alaska, the Pacific Coast of Russia, and northern Japan.Biota of North America Program 2014 state- level distribution mapIljin, Modest Mikhaĭlovich 1926. Trudy Botaničeskago Muzeja Imperatorskoj Akademii Nauk 19: 119 ;Varieties * Arnica unalaschcensis var. unalaschcensis * Arnica unalaschcensis var. tschonoskyi (Iljin) Kitam. & H.Hara ==References== ==External links== *ウサギギク 兎菊, [別名 キングルマ [学名] Arnica unalaschcensis Less. var. tschonoskyi (Iljin) Kitam. et Hara] in Japanese with color photos * 植物名一覧(薬草/ハーブ/山菜/山野草/樹木/高山植物）植物のアイウエオ順一覧表 科名：キク科/属名：ウサギギク属 和名：兎菊/別名：キングルマ/学名：''Arnica unalaschcensis var.tschonoskyi in Japanese with color photos *Ботаничка.ru, Рецепт от Гёте, Арника? А что это такое? Вот, пожалуй, обычная реакция на название этого растения. А между тем арника уникальна по широте лечебного действия. in Russian with color photos of several Arnica species including A. unalaschcensis unalaschcensis Category:Flora of Alaska Category:Flora of Eastern Asia Category:Flora of the Russian Far East Category:Plants described in 1831
title: Arnica unalaschcensis
